mapper.insert: insert into worker (wk_id, wk_num, wk_type, wk_phone, wk_password, wk_openid, wk_name, wk_creation) values (null, #{wk_num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wk_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wk_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wk_password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wk_openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wk_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now())
mapper.update:
update worker set
wk_num = #{wk_num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wk_type = #{wk_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wk_phone = #{wk_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wk_password = #{wk_password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wk_name = #{wk_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wk_isdel=#{wk_isdel}
where wk_id = #{wk_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql: wk_id, wk_num, wk_type, wk_phone, wk_password, wk_openid, wk_name, wk_creation,wk_isdel
